TEXT.S: lalu na alang mu ga Pyahow . kyan hlahuy, kyan llyung uy. hlahuy ga 'san ta mluyak ro halan ta mnayang ro muhi ngahi, halan ta tmubux lmyun ro mhi llamu na rami nni'un ta uy. llyung ga 'san ta mema 'bagan, bley ci skiyap ta bolung ro 'cyux tayal uy. myasa ci alang mu. ksli' cu ci myanux alang mu che, p'asun cyoli' baley mwah mtisal alang mu uy.
